text: Ever since the theme song for Disney ’ s upcoming Ducktales hit the internet, we haven ’ t gotten it out of our heads! Did you know that the singer who performs the song is Stuck in the Middle star Malachi Barton ‘ s mom, Felicia?! “ Check it out!!! My mom @ feliciabarton is singing the new theme song for @ disneyxd ‘ s @ ducktalestv, ” Malachi proudly announced on his Instagram last week, adding the best hashtag of them all : “ # rockstarmom ”. You probably know Felicia pretty well too — she ’ s one of the talented singers who performed with Ray Chew Live on Dancing With The Stars! Listen to the theme song below!
